nodes.text: Marco Checchetto (born 1975) is an Italian comic-book artist who has drawn Marvel Comics' miniseries Shattered Empire, Obi-Wan and Anakin, and Captain Phasma, written by Greg Rucka, Charles Soule, and Kelly Thompson respectively. He also pencilled The Screaming Citadel 1 one-shot, written by Kieron Gillen.
